about_the_game:
It's time to race for real in the most motorsports ever featured in one video game. Compete in a massive variety of the world&lsquot;s most aggressive motorsports, complete with explosive damage effects, head-to-head online multiplayer racing and a game engine rebuilt for a greater degree of simulation. Choose to embark on a World Tour of different events or go professional and follow one of six specialist motorsport careers in the Pro Career game.

  • Over 35 motorsport racing genres through 120 championships.
  • Pro Career game: Choose a motor racing discipline, including Open-Wheel, GT, Touring Car, Oval, Off-Road & Rally, and Historic, and storm from entry-level vehicle all the way up to the ultimate racing machine.
  • World Tour game: Puts you in the driving seat &emdash; start racing and blaze your own trail through the game.
  • Up to 21 cars on track in ultra-close pack racing against aggressive AI drivers.
  • The most realistic damage in any racing game.
  • Over 70 Real-World Race Cars.
  • Over 80 International Circuits.
  • Online racing: with new Practice, Qualifying and Eliminator modes.
  • True mechanical effects: tyres warm up, radiators overheat and engines blow.
detailed_description:
It's time to race for real in the most motorsports ever featured in one video game. Compete in a massive variety of the world&lsquot;s most aggressive motorsports, complete with explosive damage effects, head-to-head online multiplayer racing and a game engine rebuilt for a greater degree of simulation. Choose to embark on a World Tour of different events or go professional and follow one of six specialist motorsport careers in the Pro Career game.

  • Over 35 motorsport racing genres through 120 championships.
  • Pro Career game: Choose a motor racing discipline, including Open-Wheel, GT, Touring Car, Oval, Off-Road & Rally, and Historic, and storm from entry-level vehicle all the way up to the ultimate racing machine.
  • World Tour game: Puts you in the driving seat &emdash; start racing and blaze your own trail through the game.
  • Up to 21 cars on track in ultra-close pack racing against aggressive AI drivers.
  • The most realistic damage in any racing game.
  • Over 70 Real-World Race Cars.
  • Over 80 International Circuits.
  • Online racing: with new Practice, Qualifying and Eliminator modes.
  • True mechanical effects: tyres warm up, radiators overheat and engines blow.

name: ToCA Race Driver 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum

  • Supported OS: Windows XP
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9c
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon at 1.4GHz
  • Memory: 256Mb RAM
  • Graphics Card: Supported 32Mb Graphics Card
  • Sound: DirectX 9 Compatible Sound Card
  • Hard Drive: 6.0 Gigabytes Hard Disk Space
  • Supported Graphics Cards: ATi Radeon 8xxx, 9, 9100, 9200, 9500, 9600, 9700, 9800, X700, X800, X850
  • nVidia GeForce 3, GeForce 4 (not MX), GeForce FX 5200, 5600, 5700, 5800, 5900, 5950, 6800, 7800

    • Not compatible with all integrated sound/graphics solutions (inc. Laptops).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended

  • Supported OS: Windows XP
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9c
  • Processor: Intel Extreme Edition and Intel Pentium D or Athlon at 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 512Mb RAM
  • Graphics Card: ATi Radeon 8xxx and above, nVidia GeForce 4 and above
  • Hard Drive: 7.0 Gigabytes Hard Disk Space

TCP/IP mode (2-12 players) requirements:

  • Broadband Internet connection required – 512kbps recommended for hosting
  • TCP/IP network

short_description: It's time to race for real in the most motorsports ever featured in one video game. Compete in a massive variety of the world&lsquot;s most aggressive motorsports, complete with explosive damage effects, head-to-head online multiplayer racing and a game engine rebuilt for a greater degree of simulation.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
